name: meesho-seller-platform-enhancement
description: Proof of concept for enhancing Meesho's seller platform with AI-powered solutions

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd 2_AI_Smart_Cataloging/frontend && npm install && cd ../../3_Direct_Link_to_Live_Product/frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start" "cd 2_AI_Smart_Cataloging/backend && python api.py" "cd 4_AI_Smart_Pricing && python src/pricing_model.py"

author: Meesho Engineering Team
